articles.title: Naveen's body will be brought to India once shelling stops in Ukraine: CM Bommai
articles.description: "The EAM Jaishankar has informed us that Naveen's (Naveen Shekharappa, MBBS student who died during shelling in Ukraine) body has been embalmed and kept in a mortuary in Ukraine. His body will be brought to India once shelling stops there," Bommai said.

articles.title: CAATSA sanctions on India would be 'extraordinarily foolhardy': Senator Ted Cruz
articles.description: CAATSA is a tough US law that authorises the administration to impose sanctions on countries that purchase major defence hardware from Russia in response to Russia's annexation of Crimea in 2014 and its alleged meddling in the 2016 US presidential elections.

articles.author: AP
articles.title: Duplantis sets pole vault world record of 6.19m in Belgrade
articles.description: With all of his opponents finished, Duplantis opened his series with 5.61, 5.85 and 6.00 all on his first tries. At 6.19, he missed his first two attempts. On his third and final try, he nudged the bar slightly with his knees but it remained in place.

WR!!!! #6.19 #borntofly https://t.co/UghhIVutxv
